idea-plugin.name: Ocean Harbor
idea-plugin.description:
A modern dark theme with Islands UI support, teal accent colors, and reduced contrast for comfortable long coding sessions.
Features: - Dimmed Text: Foreground text reduced by ~20% brightness (#9eaab8) for comfortable reading - Oceanic Color Palette: Cyan (#4dd0e1), Medium Cyan (#26c6da), Mint Aqua (#64ffda) - Clear Distinction: Each syntax element has unique, easily distinguishable colors - Calm Harbor Vibes: Based on Islands theme with improved contrast and ocean theme - Special Operator Visibility: Important operators (!, ?, ??) stand out clearly
